Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's truly worth more than its face value. Considering its quality and the effort put into creating it, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value it can add to your life. I hope you find this offer appealing and look forward to potentially making this valuable addition to your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
